mapper.select: select post_id, post_type, post_name, post_content, post_register_date, member_id, post_is_blinded from tbl_post where (post_type like '스터디' or post_type like '노하우' or post_type like 'QnA') order by post_register_date desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount};

select post_id, post_type, post_name, post_content, post_register_date, member_id, post_is_blinded from tbl_post where (post_type like '문의') order by post_register_date desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount};

select distinct count(post_id) from tbl_member m join tbl_post p
on m.member_id = p.member_id and
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_id, post_name, post_content, member_id) values(#{postId}, #{postName}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select post_name, post_view_count, file_name from tbl_post p join tbl_file f on p.post_id = f.post_id where post_type = "스터디" order by post_view_count
